text:
Dana Wynter (born Dagmar Winter; 8 June 19315 May 2011) was a German-born English actress. Her best-known movie being "Invasion of the Body Snatchers" (1956). She won a Golden Globe Award. Wynter was born in Berlin.
Wynter died of congestive heart failure on 5 May 2011 in Ojai, California at the age of 79.
